plugins.name: dev-pipeline

plugins.name: mermaid

plugins.name: advanced-plugin-creator
plugins.description: Guide for creating, validating, and packaging Claude Code plugins and skills. Includes best practices, frontmatter reference, helper scripts, and a structured plugin quality reviewer.
